message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $110. This is an excellent value considering its worth to you is $120.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. I'm willing to make a deal, but I need to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. Let me propose a price of $105 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise between the value you see in it and the price I can offer.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $100. That's the maximum I'm willing to pay for the product.
